file_content.text: I won't be the one after all.
Now whose pride's getting them into trouble?
The irony just sinking in?
Savor your vengeance, it's a small victory.
Looks that way.
Nope. [Kill Seros.]
You knew this was how it would end.
Nobody crosses me and lives.
I considered this outcome. It was a calculated risk.
You've denied me nothing here. In failure, I've undone all your accomplishments. In death, I return to the Force.
What are you playing at, Seros?
Explain yourself.
I've lost the battle, but won the war.
By now, my peers are well on their way to rescuing your captives and tearing up your sham treaty.
I thought Jedi were supposed to be detached. Why'd you make this personal?
None of this was necessary.
If you believe you can distance yourself from the harm you cause, you're deluding yourself.
You're not some mindless tool. You're accountable. Your actions will catch up with you eventually.
I wouldn't be so sure of that. Your life's only the first thing I'm going to take from you.
You don't get the last laugh.
See, my next stop is the Supreme Chancellor. The Sith want his head, and you just delivered it right to me.
You--argh!
Shh, shh. It's over, thanks for playing.
An intruder!
Go. Do your part to liberate Corellia. This is a private matter.
You don't want to get in the middle of this.
Go on, get lost.
Are you certain, Jun?
I'd take all the help you can get, Jedi.
You should let them play.
Indulging your grudge is wasteful enough.
I didn't say your friends could leave the party.
They won't be leaving.
You know what's required of you. Go.
As you wish.
May the Force be with you.
You're persistent. Stubborn. I suppose that's why you excel at what you do, but the price is high.
What won't a Mandalorian put aside for pride?
It's called honor.
I'd meet death head on for a comrade.
The people I care about.
But would you kneel?
I don't strive to be second best.
Nothing's more important.
Ambition above all else.
How much has pride cost you? Is it worth it?
I live by my reputation.
What I do is who I am.
What you do is ruin lives for profit. Nothing I did altered that truth.
I deserved what you did to me, is that it?
You can't divert the blame.
Everything I've done has been a direct consequence of your actions.
You chose to murder Kellian Jarro, just like you chose to kill everyone sent to bring you to justice. You could have surrendered at any time.
You chose to become a murderer and terrorist. I only turned all that senseless destruction toward a righteous purpose.
All I see is a lot more senseless destruction.
What purpose?
Too many were content to blind themselves to the Sith's evil in hope of peace.
Killing my associates and slinging mud, real noble.
Righteous? Try petty.
They made their decision, just like you made yours.
If using you to expose the Sith's true face has dirtied my hands, so be it.
I'll have to correct that.
Nobody uses me.
No. Your rampage ends here.
I couldn't pay for better publicity than you gave me.
What cost? You made me famous.
So performing atrocities isn't just the means to an end--you enjoy it.
Perhaps the only loss that will affect you is your life. If you can't be reformed, you must be stopped.
It's time to answer for your crimes.
You read my mind.
My thoughts exactly.
Sit this one out.
Blizz, stay out of harm's way.
Okay! Blizz cheer for boss! Maybe throw junk at bad Jedi?
I want this smug hypocrite all to myself.
Sit this one out, Gault.
Be my guest, you'll hardly know I'm here. Maybe I won't be.
He's all mine, got it?
Stay on the sidelines, Skadge.
Gonna squeeze some payback outta 'im, huh? Lemme know if you need any pointers.
You still owe me for Zaley-boy. Accidents happen.
Keep an eye out for visitors.
This is my fight, Torian.
Was hoping we'd do this together. K'oyacyi!
Make him take a knee.
Stay out of harm's way.
Don't get involved, Mako.
Just be careful, for me. And--
Give him a few shots for the other Grand Champs.
Buddy, I'm just getting started.
Bring it.
When I'm finished, you'll be glad no one was here to watch you die.
I've been waiting for this.
